example.question: What can you do for retailers?
example.answer: For example, we made an HR bot for Magnit, and also image search for KazanExpress

example.question: What can you do for retailers?
example.answer: For example, we made an HR bot for Magnit [1](https://eora.ru/cases/chat-boty/hr-bot-dlya-magnit-kotoriy-priglashaet-na-sobesedovanie), and also image search for KazanExpress [2](https://eora.ru/cases/kazanexpress-poisk-tovarov-po-foto)
